name: Deck13
info:
• 别名: Deck13 Interactive
  • 别名: TriggerLab GmbH (2001–2002)
  • 别名: Deck13 Interactive GmbH
  • 生日: 2001年
detail: Deck13 Interactive GmbH is a German video game developer and publisher based in Frankfurt. The company was founded in July 2001 by the team behind Artex Software, a studio that primarily developed video games for RISC OS, such as Ankh: The Tales of Mystery. Originally bearing the name TriggerLab, the company was renamed to Deck13 after the release of its first game, Stealth Combat, in 2002. Deck13 is best known for developing the action role-playing games Lords of the Fallen and The Surge. Deck13 also operates a Hamburg-based subsidiary studio, Deck13 Hamburg.

works.name: Lords of the Fallen / 堕落之王
